name: Craft Hale Graphic Jersey - Women's
description: A light and refined jersey that uses different materials to help keep you cool. Part of Craft’s Core line, the Hale jersey is at home on weekend tours, club rides, or your first Gran Fondo.Body mapped construction puts the most breathable materials where you need them most.Light polyester materials wick away moisture.All over sublimated graphic helps keep you seen.Full length zipper offers easy venting.3 back drop-in pockets fit a light windbreaker, some tools and a handful of gels.Dropped hem provides extra coverage in the drop.Silicone grips at the back hem keeps the jersey in place.
